variable.name: MISSDAY
variable.description: MISSING DAY PART OF PROCEDURE DATE, SEE NOTE UNDER PROCDATE

variable.name: MISSMONTH
variable.description: MISSING MONTH PART OF PROCEDURE DATE, SEE NOTE UNDER PROCDATE

variable.name: MISSYEAR
variable.description: MISSING YEAR PART OF PROCEDURE DATE, SEE NOTE UNDER PROCDATE

variable.name: Procdate
variable.description: DATE OF PROCEDURE: PROCMO/PROCDY/PROCYR, NUMBER OF DAYS SINCE EXAM 1
variable.comment: IF PROCMO WAS MISSING THEN 7 WAS ASSIGNED. IF PROCDY WAS MISSING THEN 15 WAS ASSIGNED. IF PROCYR WAS MISSING THEN PROCDATE IS MISSING. SEE MISSDAY MISSMONTH MISSYEAR TO DETERMINE WHEN. DATE PARTS WERE MISSING.

variable.name: PROC_NO
variable.comment: * for cabg and heart valve surgery see separate data set: _m_2007cabg_007, codes of 141 and 143 are deleted here.
